verses.verse: And Israel<WH3478> took his journey<WH5265> with all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had, and came<WH935> to Beer-sheba,<WH884> and offered<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> unto the God<WH430> of his father<WH1> Isaac.<WH3327>
And God<WH430> spoke<WH559> unto Israel<WH3478> in the visions<WH4759> of the night,<WH3915> and said,<WH559> Jacob,<WH3290> Jacob.<WH3290> And he said,<WH559> Here<WH2009> am I.

And he said,<WH559> I<WH595> am God,<WH410> the God<WH430> of thy father:<WH1> fear<WH3372> not<WH408> to go down<WH4480> <WH3381> into Egypt;<WH4714> for<WH3588> I will there<WH8033> make<WH7760> of thee a great<WH1419> nation: <WH1471>

I <WH595> will go down<WH3381> with<WH5973> thee into Egypt;<WH4714> and I<WH595> will also<WH1571> surely bring thee up<WH5927> <WH5927> again: and Joseph<WH3130> shall put<WH7896> his hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> thine eyes.<WH5869>

And Jacob<WH3290> rose up<WH6965> from Beer-sheba:<WH4480> <WH884> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> carried<WH5375> <WH853> Jacob<WH3290> their father,<WH1> and their little ones,<WH2945> and their wives,<WH802> in the wagons<WH5699> which<WH834> Pharaoh<WH6547> had sent<WH7971> to carry<WH5375> him.

And they took<WH3947> <WH853> their cattle,<WH4735> and their goods,<WH7399> which<WH834> they had gotten<WH7408> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> and came<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> Jacob,<WH3290> and all<WH3605> his seed<WH2233> with<WH854> him:

His sons,<WH1121> and his sons'<WH1121> sons<WH1121> with<WH854> him, his daughters,<WH1323> and his sons'<WH1121> daughters,<WH1323> and all<WH3605> his seed<WH2233> brought<WH935> he with<WH854> him into Egypt.<WH4714>

And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which came<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> Jacob<WH3290> and his sons:<WH1121> Reuben,<WH7205> Jacob's<WH3290> firstborn.<WH1060>
And the sons<WH1121> of Reuben;<WH7205> Hanoch,<WH2585> and Phallu,<WH6396> and Hezron,<WH2696> and Carmi.<WH3756>
And the sons<WH1121> of Simeon;<WH8095> Jemuel,<WH3223> and Jamin,<WH3226> and Ohad,<WH161> and Jachin,<WH3199> and Zohar,<WH6714> and Shaul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of a Canaanitish woman.<WH3669>
And the sons<WH1121> of Levi;<WH3878> Gershon,<WH1648> Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>

And the sons<WH1121> of Judah;<WH3063> Er,<WH6147> and Onan,<WH209> and Shelah,<WH7956> and Pharez,<WH6557> and Zerah:<WH2226> but Er<WH6147> and Onan<WH209> died<WH4191> in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667> And the sons<WH1121> of Pharez<WH6557> were<WH1961> Hezron<WH2696> and Hamul.<WH2538>
And the sons<WH1121> of Issachar;<WH3485> Tola,<WH8439> and Phuvah,<WH6312> and Job,<WH3102> and Shimron.<WH8110>
And the sons<WH1121> of Zebulun;<WH2074> Sered,<WH5624> and Elon,<WH356> and Jahleel.<WH3177>

These <WH428> be the sons<WH1121> of Leah,<WH3812> which<WH834> she bore<WH3205> unto Jacob<WH3290> in Padan-aram,<WH6307> with<WH854> his daughter<WH1323> Dinah:<WH1783> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> of his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323> were thirty<WH7970> and three.<WH7969>
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad;<WH1410> Ziphion,<WH6837> and Haggi,<WH2291> Shuni,<WH7764> and Ezbon,<WH675> Eri,<WH6179> and Arodi,<WH722> and Areli.<WH692>

And the sons<WH1121> of Asher;<WH836> Jimnah,<WH3232> and Ishuah,<WH3438> and Isui,<WH3440> and Beriah,<WH1283> and Serah<WH8294> their sister:<WH269> and the sons<WH1121> of Beriah;<WH1283> Heber,<WH2268> and Malchiel.<WH4439>

These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Zilpah,<WH2153> whom<WH834> Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Leah<WH3812> his daughter,<WH1323> and<WH853> these<WH428> she bore<WH3205> unto Jacob,<WH3290> even sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> souls.<WH5315>
The sons<WH1121> of Rachel<WH7354> Jacob's<WH3290> wife;<WH802> Joseph,<WH3130> and Benjamin.<WH1144>

And unto Joseph<WH3130> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> were born<WH3205> <WH853> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim,<WH669> which<WH834> Asenath<WH621> the daughter<WH1323> of Poti-pherah<WH6319> priest<WH3548> of On<WH204> bore<WH3205> unto him.

And the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> were Belah,<WH1106> and Becher,<WH1071> and Ashbel,<WH788> Gera,<WH1617> and Naaman,<WH5283> Ehi,<WH278> and Rosh,<WH7220> Muppim,<WH4649> and Huppim,<WH2650> and Ard.<WH714>
These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Rachel,<WH7354> which<WH834> were born<WH3205> to Jacob:<WH3290> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> were fourteen.<WH702> <WH6240>
And the sons<WH1121> of Dan;<WH1835> Hushim.<WH2366>
And the sons<WH1121> of Naphtali;<WH5321> Jahzeel,<WH3183> and Guni,<WH1476> and Jezer,<WH3337> and Shillem.<WH8006>

These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Bilhah,<WH1090> which<WH834> Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> unto Rachel<WH7354> his daughter,<WH1323> and she bore<WH3205> <WH853> these<WH428> unto Jacob:<WH3290> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> were seven.<WH7651>

All <WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that came<WH935> with Jacob<WH3290> into Egypt,<WH4714> which came out<WH3318> of his loins,<WH3409> besides<WH4480> <WH905> Jacob's<WH3290> sons'<WH1121> wives,<WH802> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> were threescore<WH8346> and six;<WH8337>

And the sons<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> which<WH834> were born<WH3205> him in Egypt,<WH4714> were two<WH8147> souls:<WH5315> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> which came<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> were threescore and ten.<WH7657>
And he sent<WH7971> Judah<WH3063> before<WH6440> him unto<WH413> Joseph,<WH3130> to direct<WH3384> his face<WH6440> unto Goshen;<WH1657> and they came<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Goshen.<WH1657>

And Joseph<WH3130> made ready<WH631> his chariot,<WH4818> and went up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> his father,<WH1> to Goshen,<WH1657> and presented himself<WH7200> unto<WH413> him; and he fell<WH5307> on<WH5921> his neck,<WH6677> and wept<WH1058> on<WH5921> his neck<WH6677> a good while.<WH5750>

And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joseph,<WH3130> Now<WH6471> let me die,<WH4191> since<WH310> I have seen<WH7200> <WH853> thy face,<WH6440> because<WH3588> thou art yet<WH5750> alive.<WH2416>

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto<WH413> his brethren,<WH251> and unto<WH413> his father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> I will go up,<WH5927> and show<WH5046> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> him, My brethren,<WH251> and my father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> which<WH834> were in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> are come<WH935> unto<WH413> me;

And the men<WH376> are shepherds,<WH7462> <WH6629> for<WH3588> their trade<WH376> hath been<WH1961> to feed cattle;<WH4735> and they have brought<WH935> their flocks,<WH6629> and their herds,<WH1241> and all<WH3605> that<WH834> they have.
And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> Pharaoh<WH6547> shall call<WH7121> you, and shall say,<WH559> What<WH4100> is your occupation?<WH4639>

That ye shall say,<WH559> Thy servants'<WH5650> trade<WH376> hath been<WH1961> about cattle<WH4735> from our youth<WH4480> <WH5271> even until<WH5704> now,<WH6258> both<WH1571> we,<WH587> and also<WH1571> our fathers:<WH1> that<WH5668> ye may dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen;<WH1657> for<WH3588> every<WH3605> shepherd<WH7462> <WH6629> is an abomination<WH8441> unto the Egyptians.<WH4714>
